org.elasticsearch.action.indexedscripts.get

Class GetIndexedScriptRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextAndHeaderHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<GetIndexedScriptRequest>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.indexedscripts.get.GetIndexedScriptRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndicesRequest, HasContext, HasContextAndHeaders, HasHeaders, Streamable

    public class GetIndexedScriptRequest
extends ActionRequest<GetIndexedScriptRequest>
implements IndicesRequest
    A request to get an indexed script (its source) based on its language (optional) and id. The operation requires the scriptLang(String) and id(String) to be set.
    See Also:
    GetIndexedScriptResponse
